prompts.title: Ghibli-core Cozy Kitchen
prompts.description: Transform your life into a Studio Ghibli film with this nostalgic kitchen scene
prompts.prompt: A soft-lit cinematic scene of a cozy kitchen in a fantasy cottage, sunlight streaming through stained glass, overflowing with nostalgic charm, hand-drawn anime aesthetic, Studio Ghibli style, vibrant greens and warm oranges, intricate detail.
prompts.trendContext: The 'What if my life was a Ghibli film' trend, popular on TikTok/Instagram.

prompts.title: Nano Banana Action Figure
prompts.description: Turn yourself into a collectible 3D action figure with toy packaging
prompts.prompt: A detailed 3D collectible figurine of a cyberpunk hacker inside a vintage action-figure plastic box, glossy plastic texture, toy packaging theme, high-quality render, 'Gemini 2.5 Nano' aesthetic, studio lighting.
prompts.trendContext: Viral 'Nano Banana' trend turning users into collectible 3D action figures.

prompts.title: Italian Brainrot Meme
prompts.description: Create hilarious exaggerated Italian gesture reactions for memes
prompts.prompt: A cartoonish character making exaggerated Italian hand gestures, fingers pinched together, highly expressive face showing comedic frustration, colorful vibrant background, meme aesthetic, slightly exaggerated features, bright studio lighting.
prompts.trendContext: Humorous depiction of dramatic reactions and stereotypes for Reels/Shorts.

prompts.title: Pop Surrealism Alien Rapper
prompts.description: Whimsical surrealist art merging pop culture with bizarre dreamlike elements
prompts.prompt: Vibrant, chaotic illustration of an alien wearing a rapper-style outfit with oversized chains and sneakers, whimsical and bizarre dreamlike atmosphere, neon color palette, playful narrative, high contrast, adult coloring book clean outlines.
prompts.trendContext: Emerging trend merging high-end surrealism with quirky pop culture.

prompts.title: Neo-Classical Cyberpunk Angel
prompts.description: Renaissance meets dystopian future with glowing marble statues
prompts.prompt: A polished marble statue of a Renaissance angel glowing with ultraviolet light, dark somber background, gothic overtones, hyper-realistic texture, high contrast, 32k resolution, narrative depth.
prompts.trendContext: Fusion of classical art history with high-tech neon dystopian lighting.

prompts.title: Retro-Futuristic Art Deco
prompts.description: Updated Vaporwave with elegant geometric designs and metallic finishes
prompts.prompt: Modern art deco design featuring bold geometric shapes, rich metallic finishes, symmetrical composition, vibrant 80s synthwave gradients, futuristic architecture, visually pleasing depth.
prompts.trendContext: Updated Vaporwave aesthetic focused on elegant design and luxury finishes.

prompts.title: Fantasy RPG Elven Warrior
prompts.description: Epic high-fantasy character illustration for world-building and concept art
prompts.prompt: A high-fantasy elven warrior standing on a crystal cliff at dawn, intricate armor with glowing blue runes, panoramic wide shot, soft golden light, inspired by epic Tolkien-esque illustrations, digital oil painting texture.
prompts.trendContext: Consistent demand for high-fidelity world-building and character concept art.
